title: SquirrelJulietGarden
author: SquirrelJulietGarden
content: Visualized: Bitcoin Returns vs. Major Asset ClassesThe graphics from the article clearly shows this fact. It's very impressive that Bitcoin is a best investment asset in most of last 11 years from 2013 to 2023, it appears on the top in 8 years. With 3 years it does not appear on top of the list, we can see these years are bearish years for Bitcoin market.The yearly candles chart show these three years in red as visually bearish years.How is the 21 million bitcoin cap defined and enforced can help new Bitcoin investors to understand about Bitcoin total supply, new supply in future till 2104, and have more proper investment strategy from purchase to take profit.

comments.author: PIMPdev
comments.body: Quote from: SquirrelJulietGarden on June 12, 2024, 06:00:30 AMVisualized: Bitcoin Returns vs. Major Asset ClassesThe graphics from the article clearly shows this fact. It's very impressive that Bitcoin is a best investment asset in most of last 11 years from 2013 to 2023, it appears on the top in 8 years. With 3 years it does not appear on top of the list, we can see these years are bearish years for Bitcoin market.The yearly candles chart show these three years in red as visually bearish years.How is the 21 million bitcoin cap defined and enforced can help new Bitcoin investors to understand about Bitcoin total supply, new supply in future till 2104, and have more proper investment strategy from purchase to take profit.We'll see how it goes until 2030, I hope BTC will keep up with the title "the best-performing asset".

comments.author: Maus0728
comments.body: Yet people are still doubtful or are having second thoughts about investing in bitcoin when that shouldn't be the thing that you'd be doing, they still can't believe that bitcoin is getting to this point and that it's going up and up. Hopefully that more people change their minds to the point that they're going to invest in bitcoin and hodl, long-term is the game of bitcoin after all and it's a test of patience. Bitcoin's definitely the best asset right now and it would be a really bad time for you to not try to invest in it because most people already know that long-term in bitcoin, it will eventually give you the profit.

comments.author: rodskee
comments.body: Quote from: SquirrelJulietGarden on June 12, 2024, 06:00:30 AMVisualized: Bitcoin Returns vs. Major Asset ClassesThis Photo seems to be one of the best we can share in this forum , assets that called bitcoin is one of the best if you wanted to earn better than all of those investments.QuoteThe graphics from the article clearly shows this fact. It's very impressive that Bitcoin is a best investment asset in most of last 11 years from 2013 to 2023, it appears on the top in 8 years. With 3 years it does not appear on top of the list, we can see these years are bearish years for Bitcoin market.obviously this will favor everyone here in the forum and that shows bitcoin to be the best investment material for everyone.

comments.author: Felicity_Tide
comments.body: Quote from: SquirrelJulietGarden on June 12, 2024, 06:00:30 AMThe graphics from the article clearly shows this fact. It's very impressive that Bitcoin is a best investment asset in most of last 11 years from 2013 to 2023, it appears on the top in 8 years. With 3 years it does not appear on top of the list, we can see these years are bearish years for Bitcoin market.The yearly candles chart show these three years in red as visually bearish years.Bitcoin is unarguably the best investment asset. From what you've just explained, I noticed something quite interesting. During the three years when Bitcoin didn't reach the top due to bearish occurrence, it shows that many people are drawn to Bitcoin when its price is doing well. This also indicates that the FOMO is still very much present even since 2013. Just imagine for 11 years which is more than a decade, Bitcoin made it to the top spot due to the less bearish experiences in those years. But for the three years that Bitcoin didn't make it, it ended up at the last spot. This proves that the bullish trend of Bitcoin's price gains the attention of new investors.There is no longer a debate about which asset is worth investing in. The rise in the price of Bitcoin since 2013 is already enough evidence for everyone to see. And as for this year (2024), Bitcoin has already won the top spot even before the end of Q1. We just can't forget the year of the ETF approval.

comments.author: Abbatty
comments.body: Quote from: PIMPdev on June 12, 2024, 07:11:33 AMWe'll see how it goes until 2030, I hope BTC will keep up with the title "the best-performing asset".I have no doubt it will and will go farther than 2030. If you observe the chart properly you will notice it is the only with more consistency and it was able to maintain the consistency for years. Despite all the negative energies and backlash it has received it is still able to do well and still showing more potential to surpass itâ€™s current achievements. Quote from: Maus0728 on June 12, 2024, 08:09:42 AMYet people are still doubtful or are having second thoughts about investing in bitcoin when that shouldn't be the thing that you'd be doing, they still can't believe that bitcoin is getting to this point and that it's going up and up. Bitcoin's definitely the best asset right now and it would be a really bad time for you to not try to invest in it because most people already know that long-term in bitcoin, it will eventually give you the profit.People are still having doubts despite the growth they have noticed in years and bitcoin maintaining such high levels and being one of the best and promising asset should be reason enough to believe in it. Well if they keep doubting they keep missing out on the opportunity to be part of the best investment in the world. Some people have realized their mistakes and hopefully these doubters would too i just hope they realize it soon enough because bitcoin waits for no one.

comments.author: kryptqnick
comments.body: It's a neat infographic, thanks for sharing! Bitcoin is indeed the best-performing asset 8 years out of 11, which is very impressive. But I do believe it matters that it was also the worst-performing asset in the other three years, and with a huge difference between it and the closest worst-performing competitor. It's probably those years, in which Bitcoin loses over a half of its value, that are scary to some investors and make Bitcoin seem like a very risky asset. Unlike some other options on the list, it can lead to huge losses in an unlucky year, and some just can't handle that pressure.

comments.author: SquirrelJulietGarden
comments.body: Quote from: Maus0728 on June 12, 2024, 08:09:42 AMYet people are still doubtful or are having second thoughts about investing in bitcoin when that shouldn't be the thing that you'd be doing, they still can't believe that bitcoin is getting to this point and that it's going up and up. Hopefully that more people change their minds to the point that they're going to invest in bitcoin and hodl, long-term is the game of bitcoin after all and it's a test of patience.First comes first serves but surely there were bigger risk in earlier years than now in 2024, 15 years since Bitcoin genesis block. With Bitcoin Spot ETFs in 2024 in USA, we will move into future with better foundation for survival of Bitcoin market.People who are late comers will still have their parties but they will have to pay higher cost for their entries to purchase Bitcoin at higher price. I don't like to use words like more expensive because if they see Bitcoin like an expensive asset, they will not buy it.Quote from: kryptqnick on June 12, 2024, 09:38:30 AMBitcoin is indeed the best-performing asset 8 years out of 11, which is very impressive. But I do believe it matters that it was also the worst-performing asset in the other three years, and with a huge difference between it and the closest worst-performing competitor. It's probably those years, in which Bitcoin loses over a half of its value, that are scary to some investors and make Bitcoin seem like a very risky asset. Unlike some other options on the list, it can lead to huge losses in an unlucky year, and some just can't handle that pressure.The bottom line from the neat graphics is if people understand Bitcoin market cycle and with a big condition that history repeats, they will be able to avoid a first bearish year in every 4-year cycle of Bitcoin market. By this, they might exit earlier a little bit, miss the ATH of a cycle, but they will avoid a worse year in each cycle. Then they will get very good ROI with rest 3 years of the cycle, I emphasize, even in bear market can last 2 years, the last one will be profitable because market will warm up before a next bull run of new cycle.

comments.body: Quote from: SquirrelJulietGarden on June 12, 2024, 11:15:08 AMThe bottom line from the neat graphics is if people understand Bitcoin market cycle and with a big condition that history repeats, they will be able to avoid a first bearish year in every 4-year cycle of Bitcoin market. By this, they might exit earlier a little bit, miss the ATH of a cycle, but they will avoid a worse year in each cycle. Then they will get very good ROI with rest 3 years of the cycle, I emphasize, even in bear market can last 2 years, the last one will be profitable because market will warm up before a next bull run of new cycle.If everyone realizes that this is the year of the bear trend and so on they will start investing according to it and when that happens the market trend changes alongside too cause it's nothing but the game of demand and supply and even though it's clear that the cycle is close people tend to lose their patience and exist or enter at the wrong time till now.

comments.author: Assface16678
comments.body: Quote from: jrrsparkles on June 12, 2024, 06:39:29 PMQuote from: SquirrelJulietGarden on June 12, 2024, 11:15:08 AMThe bottom line from the neat graphics is if people understand Bitcoin market cycle and with a big condition that history repeats, they will be able to avoid a first bearish year in every 4-year cycle of Bitcoin market. By this, they might exit earlier a little bit, miss the ATH of a cycle, but they will avoid a worse year in each cycle. Then they will get very good ROI with rest 3 years of the cycle, I emphasize, even in bear market can last 2 years, the last one will be profitable because market will warm up before a next bull run of new cycle.If everyone realizes that this is the year of the bear trend and so on they will start investing according to it and when that happens the market trend changes alongside too cause it's nothing but the game of demand and supply and even though it's clear that the cycle is close people tend to lose their patience and exist or enter at the wrong time till now.True, but there are many investors or holders of bitcoin is worrying about the bearish market of bitcoin and they are mostly the new ones who invested in bitcoin recently, little they know we are in a bearish cycle and although this seems bothering but in opposite this is the best opportunity or time to enter in a market using DCA, because with that when the bullish cycle comes then we can earn from it and benefit from it, its just a matter of time when we will enter in the market, but as long as bitcoin is there we will be sure that it will continue on making its break through and will set another shocking records for example its recent ATH, but I'm sure everyone of us expect that because bitcoin is that great. So those who are reluctant and hesitant to invest in bitcoin, think again. You are missing a great opportunity here. It is still not too late to enter and invest in bitcoin.

comments.author: Reatim
comments.body: Quote from: PIMPdev on June 12, 2024, 07:11:33 AMWe'll see how it goes until 2030, I hope BTC will keep up with the title "the best-performing asset".We see bitcoin has grown over the past few years but actually I think we are only really starting to see the growth of bitcoin. The world has its eyes on bitcoin and we are seeing it slowly creep up to the top valuable assets.Despite its growth, many still are not aware of bitcoin thus I am confident that the more people know about bitcoin the more it can grow in the future. For those who are holding bitcoin right now are in for a good run!

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: There is no doubt that those who invested in BTC 10 or 11 years ago profited to such an extent that it is difficult to explain to anyone - and if you take into account the period from 2010 to today, the price of BTC has increased by an incredible +138273851.84%. Those who will say that investing in gold is profitable are somewhat right, but if we take 2010 as a reference, then we can see that in that year the price of gold was on average around $1200, and today it is around $2300. If we add inflation to all that, then those who invest in "safer" assets don't have too many reasons to consider themselves successful. Nevertheless, even today you will hear people fiercely defending investments in gold, stocks, government bonds and similar things, especially if you mention Bitcoin to them in the context of all this.

comments.author: Kemarit
comments.body: Yeah, it's pretty obvious that in 2017, when Bitcoin has the media attention, and reaches a new all time high of almost $20,000, it will be the best investment. And moving forward, we have proved our point and yet there are still investors who are not that smart to put their money on the market and just let it sleep without doing anything just by HODLing and for sure in the next following 8 years they can see their initial investments turning into x profit that no other assets can give like Gold o Oil.So it doesn't make sense why there are a lot of skepticism by today, we have showed them already by looking at the past and yet they don't want to invest on it. But I guess, we can't really force anyone until it's too late for them and us taking the profits of what we have sacrifice in the last 10 years or so and becoming self made millionaire - and that is thanks to Bitcoin.

comments.author: ultrloa
comments.body: Quote from: Reatim on June 13, 2024, 03:11:27 AMQuote from: PIMPdev on June 12, 2024, 07:11:33 AMWe'll see how it goes until 2030, I hope BTC will keep up with the title "the best-performing asset".We see bitcoin has grown over the past few years but actually I think we are only really starting to see the growth of bitcoin. The world has its eyes on bitcoin and we are seeing it slowly creep up to the top valuable assets.Despite its growth, many still are not aware of bitcoin thus I am confident that the more people know about bitcoin the more it can grow in the future. For those who are holding bitcoin right now are in for a good run! The growth of bitcoin over the years of its existence already giving us a hint that there would be more good growth to come with this asset in future and we already notice that demands rise up together with its global exposure so I will not be surprise if bitcoin price would reach for many digits as predicted by those self proclaim experts. Many institutions are following on what is the latest development of bitcoin so maybe in future we could see them participate and try to grab something what bitcoin could able to offer on their businesses.Although bitcoin is famous still there are people doesn't know its existence, but we should not worry about that since once bitcoin would able to reach more achievement especially with acceptance on legal side then provably the information about its existence would able to reach to those people who doesn't know about bitcoin.

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: Quote from: SquirrelJulietGarden on June 12, 2024, 06:00:30 AMThe graphics from the article clearly shows this fact. It's very impressive that Bitcoin is a best investment asset in most of last 11 years from 2013 to 2023, it appears on the top in 8 years. With 3 years it does not appear on top of the list, we can see these years are bearish years for Bitcoin market.There is no denying that Bitcoin has now become the biggest asset anyone can own in 2024. 2013 to 2017 was a time when Bitcoin was not widely regarded as a mainstream asset. Since the approval of Bitcoin ETF, it now competes directly with Gold ETF. This is reminiscent of a time when Bitcoin was frequently compared to Gold in the mainstream media. However, now Bitcoin is getting more attention than any other asset it used to be before. There is awareness and then their is the need to secure oneself by anyone in those countries where Bitcoin has already started mass adoption.Quote from: SquirrelJulietGarden on June 12, 2024, 06:00:30 AMHow is the 21 million bitcoin cap defined and enforced can help new Bitcoin investors to understand about Bitcoin total supply, new supply in future till 2104, and have more proper investment strategy from purchase to take profit.I agree a proper investment strategy will always help anyone interested in Bitcoin. In my country, we always had an option known as SIP (Systematic Investment plan) from 2021 that was being promoted by our local exchanges to invest in Bitcoin. It was later known as DCA in dollar terms and I am aware a lot of small investors used to invest in SIP till the government came up with a new tax regulation for investing in Bitcoin and altcoins.

comments.author: mirakal
comments.body: This should be known to people and change their views about bitcoin because whether they like it or not bitcoin will continue to grow and become a more valuable asset in the world. We don't need to wait for another decade before we invest but instead do it now for the sake of a better future. Because if we can afford to invest in other stuff like real estate and gold, that is not as impossible also with bitcoin. I hope the chart is enough to clear doubtful minds into an open-minded one. We never lose for bitcoin if we never sell low and that is what we should have to put in our mind. Others feel regret for not investing early, we don't need to have that feeling and regrets as well since we know it already.

comments.author: legendbtc
comments.body: Quote from: mirakal on June 13, 2024, 12:01:31 PMThis should be known to people and change their views about bitcoin because whether they like it or not bitcoin will continue to grow and become a more valuable asset in the world. We don't need to wait for another decade before we invest but instead do it now for the sake of a better future. Because if we can afford to invest in other stuff like real estate and gold, that is not as impossible also with bitcoin. I hope the chart is enough to clear doubtful minds into an open-minded one. We never lose for bitcoin if we never sell low and that is what we should have to put in our mind. Others feel regret for not investing early, we don't need to have that feeling and regrets as well since we know it already.Â  Personally, I don't care how people view bitcoin, and the fact that some people are skeptical about bitcoin is an opportunity for the rest. Therefore, we should focus on accumulating bitcoin for ourselves instead of expecting everyone to change their opinion about bitcoin. Those who are always skeptical and refuse to accept new things need to receive a proper lesson and they will have to buy bitcoin at a higher price when it is recognized worldwide. Those who have the courage to take risks and invest early in bitcoin deserve greater rewards. I find everything very fair, so we need to focus more on our bitcoin investment because we deserve it.

comments.author: GideonGono
comments.body: If we would compare the current price to the price 8 or 11 years ago, it would show us that Bitcoin was one of the best asset of investment back then, and I believe that it would continue to do so even in the future.

comments.author: Ishicryptic
comments.body: Quote from: Maus0728 on June 12, 2024, 08:09:42 AMYet people are still doubtful or are having second thoughts about investing in bitcoin when that shouldn't be the thing that you'd be doing, they still can't believe that bitcoin is getting to this point and that it's going up and up. Hopefully that more people change their minds to the point that they're going to invest in bitcoin and hodl, long-term is the game of bitcoin after all and it's a test of patience. Bitcoin's definitely the best asset right now and it would be a really bad time for you to not try to invest in it because most people already know that long-term in bitcoin, it will eventually give you the profit.Bitcoin is definitely the best thing that has happened to the financial world in less than two decades, and the chart in the OP is a testament of this fact. The other assets like gold has been in existence for a very long time and Bitcoin, that is new compared to them has been at the top for 8 years in the 11 years of the chart. I wonder what more evidence that people who have not adopted it needs to accept it as the best investment that there is. I believe that as more people are becoming enlightened about the potentials of Bitcoin as a store of value are holding it, the demand will continue to increase which will also see the price to increasing during the bull runs.
